revised_title: Kinetics of Reactions in the Hydrogen-Oxygen Chain Reaction
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the rates of reaction of oxygen atoms with hydroxyl and hydrogen in a flow system. They found that the reaction rates were independent of temperature and equal to about 1/20 of the bimolecular collision frequency. This study provides valuable data for understanding the kinetics of individual steps in the chain reaction between hydrogen and oxygen.
